reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable. The softness receives mixed feedback, with one customer noting it's not scratchy or stiff at all.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable
items.body: So comfortable. I ordered the charcoal gray and the color is nice with heathered gray and black. The material is like a soft mohair with a touch of silky to it. Not scratchy or stiff at all. There is a lot of elastic return when the material is pulled so the shape stays well in place all day. The size fits as a relaxed oversized top. You could size down one and still be fine if you wanted a little more sculpted look. The look is a relaxed look but not frumpy. I wear shirts under or tank tops with most all my tops. This top would look best with an untucked button up collar style shirt under. It works well with both dress pants and jeans. I hope they add additional colors as I would like to buy more. Read more
items.author: Crimson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicer than I expected
items.body: This is a nice sweater. Much better than I expected. I have ordered other Amazon Essentials, crew neck sweaters that were not as nice at all. (Very thin and pilled in one wearing.) I usually wear a large in tops and I ordered a large in this sweater. It’s an oversized, boxy fit. I probably could have got away with a medium but even then it would still have a loose, boxy look. This doesn’t seem like a style that would cling to your body unless you really sized down. I decided to try the large and figured I could wash or dry if I needed to shrink it up a little. I’m 5’4”, athletic build and probably could wear it with leggings as it does cover my backside. I haven’t needed to wash it yet so I can’t comment if this is even going to be an issue. I would say it’s medium weight, dense knit. It does have this fuzzy/mohair look and feel. It seems anytime I buy this type of knit there is pilling. I haven’t worn it enough to see if pilling is going to be an issue. And if there is pilling, the mohair look does not do well with a fabric shaver. (At least on other sweaters I’ve tried to use a shaver-almost like it would need a sweater ‘brush’) I would say it’s a cool tone pink—doesn’t look lilac or purple to me. I ordered the gray and would like to see it in other colors. I don’t find it itchy but I wear a tshirt or LS shirt underneath and typically am not sensitive to wool or sweaters in general. I will update my review if there are any issues with washing or pilling. Read more
items.author: plendy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, cozy, and better than expected
items.body: This is a really cute and comfortable sweater. I normally wear a small, ordered a small, and while it does feel roomy, it’s clearly meant to be an oversized fit — so I’d still consider it true to size for the style. The charcoal heather color is especially nice and looks way cuter in person than I expected from an Amazon Essentials piece. The material has a good amount of stretch and bounces back well, which helps it keep its shape. It’s soft with a little bit of bulk to it and is definitely warm enough for cooler days. It is slightly itchy, but I always wear it with an undershirt and it’s nowhere near the most irritating sweater I’ve owned. Once layered properly, it’s not an issue at all. The sleeves stay up when pushed to the elbows, which is a nice touch, and it pairs really well with jeans for a casual, pulled-together look. Overall, I wasn’t expecting something this cute from Amazon Essentials, but this one surprised me in a good way. Comfortable, warm, and stylish enough for everyday wear. Recommended. Read more
items.author: DexMachina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy!
items.body: Great sweater!! Warm and cozy! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Shedding, itchy, the worst pilling of any sweater I’ve owned
items.body: Not soft at all, borderline itchy fabric. Pills SO bad. I hadn’t even washed it yet and it was pilling and shedding within an hour of wearing it. It’s so cute which is why I’m giving it two stars and not one, but definitely not for me. Read more
items.author: Bunny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable
items.body: It's very soft, very comfortable, and the color is beautiful. It's also very warm. Read more
items.author: panpap

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just okay
items.body: This sweater is just okay for me. I love sweaters you can dress up or down and this one fits the bill. Skirt and a button up underneath, office ready! Jeans and tennis shoes, absolutely! Is it a good value? Maybe so. The fit was really awkward on me. The sleeves do not go all the way to my wrist, they seem short-ish. It is also a boxy fit, so maybe not very flattering, and though the material seems quality, it is very itchy/scratchy. I will wear it with a layer underneath and probably push the sleeves up a bit to disguise the shortness. For reference, I am a size 10US and 5'5". I ordered a size large. Read more
items.author: MandyMoo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s cozier on the inside!
items.body: This sweater looks itchy but it isn’t. It’s even softer on the inside so it has become my wife’s favorite outerwear either at home or out and about. Being oversized as described, the sleeves are long enough to keep all but her fingertips nicely covered and warm. The collar is a perfect fit as well without bunching up or stretching. It’s holding up quite nicely in our three cats and a grandbaby household. I also love the look on her as dark heather charcoal gray is my favorite color, and for the price (around $30) it’s very well priced for what you get so I’ll be watching for more color choices later, maybe some blues or greens would be nice, if you’re listening! Read more
items.author: alanmoore78

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Camel Heather, Pastel Lilac, Charcoal Heather. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
